ygData.subject: Re: Where to hunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: Try Lavastorm or the dungeon Najena contained within.. farther out in Lavastorm is Solusek A and B, as well.  You might like it.  You will have to run through
ygData.messageBody:
Try Lavastorm or the dungeon Najena contained within.. farther out in
Lavastorm is Solusek A and B, as well. You might like it. You will have
to run through Nektulos forest to get there...so I don't know if you need
to invis yourself and party being a High Elf, I think you do. There are a
lot of groups that come through there with level 12 on up to mid
30's. Something for almost everyone. :)



At 12:32 PM 5/16/99 -0600, you wrote:
>Hi all
>
> I am a fresh 16th level wizard currently bound in the Qeynos area, I
> was wondering where the best solo/group hunting grounds are? So far 16
> seems to be a "tweener" level, too high for some places and too low for
> others. I don't really care where the areas are. (willing to relocate : )
> ) I'm just looking for a place my group can fight, that has decent
> soloing near by.
>
>Thanks
>
>Trystesa 16th level High Elf Wizard on Tunare
